description: This file defines a React component for the Devices page in a wildlife monitoring system. It imports layout and form components, displays a title and placeholder content for devices, and includes a handler for saving device data.

methods.name: Devices()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the Devices page, including layout, title, placeholder list, and a form with a save handler.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Function to handle form submission, currently logging data to the console as a placeholder for API integration.
